entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
